Html:
Hi,

Does this great(!!) library supports editing polylines like the source google map API V3 allows on the web? 

Google Maps Javascript API V3 Reference:

google.maps.PolylineOptions:

editable,  boolean,  If set to true, the user can edit this shape by dragging the control points shown at the vertices and on each segment. Defaults tofalse.

 

(https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/reference#PolylineOptions )

 

Thanks,

Alon

You have to program that functionality yourself.

It's not too hard, you could for example show a small marker at every vertice of the polyline, and if you move that marker, update the polyline.

radioman wrote:

nop

Do you plan to?

 

xandolph wrote:

You have to program that functionality yourself.

It's not too hard, you could for example show a small marker at every vertice of the polyline, and if you move that marker, update the polyline.

For sure, just wanted to know if was already implemented...
